title: "Description"

This site presents 3D visualization of grouped circular boxplots. Software reference link: [GroupedCircularBoxplot](https://github.com/jdberlinski/GroupedCircularBoxplot).

### Visualizations

This page contains a navigation bar on the left for accessing real data applications.

(Warning: The loading time for the Visualizations page could be long.)

### Instructions for interactive views

The 3D interactive plots are implemented with the `rgl` functions and here are instructions for manipulation:

- Rotation: Click and hold with the left mouse button, then drag the plot to rotate it and gain different perspectives.

- Resize: Zoom in and out with the scroll wheel, or the right mouse button.
